name: Binkowski, Appellant, v. Highway Truck Drivers and Helpers, Local 107
name_abbreviation: Binkowski v. Highway Truck Drivers & Helpers, Local 107

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
parties: Binkowski, Appellant, v. Highway Truck Drivers and Helpers, Local 107.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order in this case denying the motion to take off the nonsuit entered at the trial is affirmed on the per curiam opinion of Court of Common Pleas No. 7 of Philadelphia County, reported at 8 D. & C. 2d 254.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John Rogers Carroll, with him McBride, von Moschsisker & Bradley, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Binkowski, Appellant, v. Highway Truck Drivers and Helpers, Local 107.
May 27, 1957:
Argued April 18, 1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
Herbert K. Fisher, for appellant.
John Rogers Carroll, with him McBride, von Moschsisker & Bradley, for appellee.
